race.name: Vole
entries: Vole Traits
Your Vole character has the following traits:

entries.name: Age
entries: A Vole matures by age 10, and lives for up to 50 years.

entries.name: Size
entries: Voles stand between 2 and 4 feet tall, and average about 40 pounds. Your size is Small.

entries.name: Speed
entries: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, write and read Common, plus one other language of your choice.

entries.name: Ability Score Increase
entries: Your Intelligence score increases by 2, and one other ability score of your choice increases by 1.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in {@quickref Vision and Light||2||dim light} within 60 feet of yourself as if it were {@quickref Vision and Light||2||bright light} and in darkness as if it were {@quickref Vision and Light||2||dim light}. You discern colors in that darkness only as shades of gray.

entries.name: Too Clever
entries: You delight in creating puzzles and traps. You are proficient in one of Thieves' or {@item Tinker's tools|PHB}. You have advantage on an Intelligence or Dexterity checks when setting traps or creating puzzles or riddles.

entries.name: Tricksy
entries: You can cast {@spell snare|XGE} with this trait. Starting at 3rd level, you can cast {@spell knock} with it, and starting at 5th level, you can also cast {@spell nondetection} with it. Once you cast a spell with this trait, you can't cast the same spell with it again until you finish a long rest. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Naturally Stealthy
entries: You can attempt to hide even when you are obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than you.

race.name: Hedgehog
entries: Hedgehog Traits
Your Hedgehog character has the following traits:

entries.name: Age
entries: Hedgehogs mature by age 15, and live up to 80 years.

entries.name: Size
entries: Hedgehogs stand between 5 and 6 feet tall and average about 180 pounds.
Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Speed
entries: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, write and read Common, plus one other language of your choice.

entries.name: Ability Score Increase
entries: Your Strength score increases by 2, and one other ability score of your choice increases by 1.

entries.name: Cellar Hog
entries: You are proficient in either {@item Brewer's supplies|PHB} or {@item Cook's utensils|PHB}.

entries.name: Natural Armor
entries: Your spines provide natural defense.
Your unarmored AC is 15 plus your dexterity modifier, up to a maximum of 17.
You may not equip armor, but you may equip a shield.

entries.name: Roll to Hit
entries: As an action, you can curl into a ball and roll through the battlefield.
If you roll within 5 feet of another creature, you may choose to make it succeed on a DC15 Dexterity saving throw or be damaged by your spikes.
On a failure, they take piercing damage given by a number of {@dice d4} equal to your proficiency bonus.
Your AC becomes 20 for the duration of this movement.
This feature may affect a number of creatures up to your proficiency bonus and uses your action and your movement.

entries.name: Spikes, yo
entries: When you are hit with a melee attack, you can choose to use your reaction to deal {@damage 1d4} piercing damage to the attacking creature.
This damage increases to {@dice 2d4} at 5th level, {@dice 3d4} at 11th level, and {@dice 4d4} at 17th level.

race.name: Badger
entries: Badger Traits
Your Badger character has the following traits:

entries.name: Ability Score Increase
entries: Your Constitution score increases by 2, and one other ability score of your choice increases by 1.

entries.name: Age
entries: Badgers mature by age 20, and may live up to 150 years.

entries.name: Speed
entries: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

entries.name: Size
entries: Badgers stand between 6 and 8 feet tall and average about 280 pounds.
Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, write and read Common, plus one other language of your choice.

entries.name: Powerful Build
entries: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

entries.name: Battle-Trained
entries: You are proficient with martial weapons and {@item smith's tools|PHB}.

entries.name: Eulalia!
entries: Your training in leadership has led to the ability to inspire those around you in battle. As a bonus action, select up to 8 creatures within 15 feet of yourself. Until the start of your next turn, these creatures may add an additional {@dice 1d4} to each of their attack rolls and saving throws.
You may use this trait a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain all expended uses upon a long rest.

entries.name: Bloodwrath
entries: Once per long rest, you may activate your Bloodwrath as a bonus action. Roll a number of {@dice d8} equal to 3 times your proficiency bonus and gain that many temporary hit points. While Bloodwrath is active, you gain resistance to all damage. Additionally, the number of damage dice from your weapon is doubled. You cannot cast spells while in Bloodwrath and cannot gain temporary hit points from another source while in Bloodwrath.

Your Bloodwrath ends if all of the temporary hit points provided by this feature are lost, or if your turn ends and you have not attacked a hostile creature since your last turn or taken damage since then. Once your Bloodwrath ends, you take 2 levels of {@condition exhaustion}, and cannot take actions or move for one turn.

race.name: Hare
entries: Hare Traits
Your Hare character has the following traits:

entries.name: Age
entries: Hares mature by age 15, and may live up to 80 years.

entries.name: Size
entries: Hares stand between 6 and 7 feet tall and average about 180 pounds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Speed
entries: Your base walking speed is 40 feet.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, write and read Common, plus one other language of your choice.

entries.name: Bottomless Pit
entries: You can eat three times as fast as an average creature your size and can consume two days worth of full meals in one sitting with no ill effects. This does not affect your typical need for food.

entries.name: Army Discipline
entries: You have proficiency in two martial weapons of your choice.

entries.name: Hare Kick
entries: As a bonus action, you may kick a creature within 5 feet of you. This counts as a melee weapon attack and uses your Dexterity modifier and proficiency bonus. On a hit, the creature takes {@damage 1d6} bludgeoning damage plus your Dexterity modifier, and must make a DC 13 strength saving throw or be pushed 5 feet away. If the creature fails by 5 or more, it is pushed 10 feet away.
You may use this trait a number of times equal to your Proficiency bonus. You regain all uses after completing a long rest.

entries.name: Perilous
entries: Once per short rest, you can give yourself advantage on one attack or saving throw. You may choose to use this feature after you have rolled, but before you know the result of the roll.
Additionally, once per long rest, if you were to drop to 0 hit points, you fall to 1 hit point instead.

entries.name: Lineages
entries: You may select from one of two hare lineages: Long Patrol and March Hare.

race.name: Mice
entries: Mouse Traits
Your Mouse character has the following traits:

entries.name: Age
entries: A Mouse matures by age 10, and lives for up to 50 years.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, write and read Common, plus one other language of your choice.

entries.name: Ability Score Increase
entries: You may choose to add 2 to one ability score of your choice, and 1 to another. Alternately, you may choose to add 1 to three ability scores of your choice.

entries.name: Ingenious
entries: You have a number of ingenuity die ({@dice d6}) equal to your proficiency bonus. These die can be added to any attack, skill check, or saving throw. You may add the value after you have rolled but before you know the result of the roll. You regain all uses on a long rest.

entries.name: I Am That Is
entries: You have advantage when making intelligence checks to solve a puzzle or riddle.

entries.name: Feat
entries: You may select one feat of your choice.

race.name: Otter
entries: Otter Traits
Your Otter character has the following traits:

entries.name: Age
entries: An Otter matures by age 20, and lives for up to 100 years.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, write and read Common, plus one other language of your choice.

entries.name: Ability Score Increase
entries: Your Strength score increases by 2, and one other ability score of your choice increases by 1.

entries.name: River Fighter
entries: You are proficient with javelins and slings.

entries.name: Tail Hit
entries: As an action, you can make a melee weapon attack using your tail. You may add your strength modifier and your proficiency bonus to the attack roll. It has a reach of 5ft, with one target. On a hit, you do {@dice 1d8} plus your strength modifier bludgeoning damage. This attack is not made at disadvantage due to being underwater.

entries.name: River Scion
entries: You can hold your breath under water for 10 minutes and you do not lose your breath when casting spells or receiving damage, unless that damage is from a critical hit. Additionally, you have a swimming speed equal to your walking speed.

entries.name: Ruff'n'Tumble
entries: As a reaction to a critical hit, you may instead turn that attack into a normal hit. You tumble out of the way into a space adjacent to the attacking creature, you can move up to 10 feet as part of the reaction. If there is no where you can move, you cannot use this feature. You may use this feature twice per day and regain all uses after completing a long rest.

race.name: Mole
entries: Mole Traits
Your Mole character has the following traits:

entries.name: Age
entries: A Mole matures by age 20, and lives for up to 100 years.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, write and read Common, plus one other language of your choice.

entries.name: Ability Score Increase
entries: Your Wisdom score increases by 2, and one other ability score of your choice increases by 1.

entries.name: Child of Earth
entries: You cannot get lost while traveling underground. You have {@sense Darkvision} to 120 feet, and {@sense Blindsight} to 10 feet. While in sunlight, you have disadvantage on {@skill Perception} checks which rely on vision.
Additionally, you have a burrow speed equal to your walking speed.

entries.name: Digging Claws
entries: Your claws are natural weapons, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with them, you deal slashing damage equal to {@dice 1d6} plus you Strength modifier instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike.

entries.name: Gaffer's Wisdom
entries: You have advantage on Wisdom checks made to determine the safest path or best course of action.

entries.name: Unintelligible
entries: You speak in such a strong dialect that creatures have a hard time understanding you. It takes you twice as long to convey the same information as other creatures unless the creatures you are talking with have spent at least a week with you.

race.name: Shrew
entries: Shrew Traits
Your Shrew character has the following traits:

entries.name: Age
entries: A Shrew matures by age 15, and lives for up to 80 years.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, write and read Common, plus one other language of your choice.

entries.name: Ability Score Increase
entries: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and one other ability score of your choice increases by 1.

entries.name: Quick Dueling
entries: You are proficient with rapiers.

entries.name: Fury of the Small
entries: When you damage a creature with an attack or a spell and the creature's size is larger than yours, you can cause the attack or spell to deal extra damage to the creature. The extra damage equals your level. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Pack Tactics
entries: You have advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of your allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

entries.name: Shrewd
entries: As argumentative folk, you know have learned how to throw conversations to your advantage. When any creature within 60 feet of you makes a Wisdom or Charisma check, you can force them to reroll the {@dice d20} and take the new roll. You can use this a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus per day and regain all uses after completing a long rest.

entries.name: Riverfolk
entries: You know the local waterways and cannot get lost while travelling by boat on a river.

race.name: Squirrel
entries: Squirrel Traits
Your Squirrel character has the following traits:

entries.name: Age
entries: A Squirrel matures by age 15, and lives for up to 80 years.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, write and read Common, plus one other language of your choice.

entries.name: Ability Score Increase
entries: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and one other ability score of your choice increases by 1.

entries.name: Strike at Range
entries: You are proficient with shortbows.

entries.name: Take Aim
entries: As a bonus action, you give yourself advantage on your next attack roll on the current turn. You can use this bonus action only if you haven't moved during this turn, and after you use the bonus action, your speed is 0 until the end of the current turn. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus and regain all uses after completing a long rest.

entries.name: Verdant Native
entries: A native of forests and brushland, you have advantage on stealth checks made to hide in trees or brush. Additionally, you have a climbing speed equal to your walking speed.

entries.name: Guerilla Tactics
entries: As a bonus action, you can move up to your speed. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks and the next stealth check you make within the next minute is made at advantage. You can use this feature twice per day and regain all uses after completing a long rest. If you are in a forest, you can use this feature two additional times.

race.name: Fox
entries: Fox Traits
Your Fox character has the following traits:

entries.name: Age
entries: A Fox matures by age 20, and lives for up to 100 years.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, write and read Common, plus one other language of your choice.

entries.name: Ability Score Increase
entries: Your Charisma score increases by 2, and one other ability score of your choice increases by 1.

entries.name: Fox's Cunning
entries: You can chose to gain advantage on an Intelligence ability check or saving throw. You can chose to use this ability after you have rolled your die but before you know the result of the check. You can use this ability once per short rest.

entries.name: Flash of Insight
entries: Your cunning allows you insight into your immediate environment. As a bonus action, select up to 8 creatures within 15 feet of you. Each of these creatures gains a {@dice d6} that they can roll and add to any skill checks made until the start of your next turn. You can use this feature a number of times equivalent to your proficiency bonus and regain all uses on a short rest.

entries.name: Lineages
entries: Choose from one of three lineages: Marlfox, Farseer or Gorgeborn.

race.name: Rat
entries: Rat Traits
Your Rat character has the following traits:

entries.name: Age
entries: A Rat matures by age 10, and lives for up to 70 years.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, write and read Common, plus one other language of your choice.

entries.name: Ability Score Increase
entries: Your Constitution score increases by 2, and one other ability score of your choice increases by 1.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in {@quickref Vision and Light||2||dim light} within 60 feet of yourself as if it were {@quickref Vision and Light||2||bright light} and in darkness as if it were {@quickref Vision and Light||2||dim light}. You discern colors in that darkness only as shades of gray.

entries.name: Pack Tactics
entries: You have advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of your allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

entries.name: Strong Stomach
entries: You are resistant to poison damage.

entries.name: Savage Attacks
entries: When you score a critical hit with a melee weapon attack, you can roll one of the weapon's damage dice one additional time and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.

race.name: Ermine
entries: Ermine Traits
Your Ermine character has the following traits:

entries.name: Age
entries: A Ermine matures by age 25, and lives for up to 200 years.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, write and read Common, plus one other language of your choice.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in {@quickref Vision and Light||2||dim light} within 60 feet of yourself as if it were {@quickref Vision and Light||2||bright light} and in darkness as if it were {@quickref Vision and Light||2||dim light}. You discern colors in that darkness only as shades of gray.

entries.name: Martial Training
entries: You grew up around weaponry and have learned the basic skills. You can add your proficiency bonus to two martial weapons of your choice.

entries.name: Quick Pickup
entries: When a fox character uses their Flash of Insight feature and you are within 15 feet, able to hear, and not {@condition incapacitated}, you may use your reaction to move up to half your speed without provoking opportunity attacks and make an attack against one creature of your choice.
Alternatively, you may instead use your reaction to perform the {@action Help} action and aid a creature within 10 feet of you.

entries.name: Totally Tubular
entries: As a long and slender creature, you have advantage on saves and checks to escape restraint or grapple.

entries.name: Lineages
entries: Choose from one of three lineages: Stoat, Ferret or Weasel.

entries.name: Ability Score Increase
entries: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and one other ability score of your choice increases by 1.

entries.name: Tis Our Law
entries: If a character with the Badger ancestry uses their Eulalia! Trait and you are within 15 feet, able to hear, and not {@condition incapacitated}, you may use your reaction to move up to half your speed and take one attack against a creature of your choice without provoking opportunity attacks.

entries.name: Ability Score Increase
entries: Your Constitution score increases by 2, and one other ability score of your choice increases by 1.

entries.name: Bonny Feast
entries: When you sit down for a meal, you can share at least 50 gold worth of wine (that you provide) with others at the meal, which is then consumed. Choose a number of creatures who are feasting with you, up to twice your proficiency bonus. Each of these creatures gains {@dice 2d10} temporary hit points and makes their next saving throw with advantage. These benefits last for 24 hours.
This meal takes an hour to consume and the benefits only apply after the hour is over. You may use this feature once per long rest.

entries.name: Expert Camouflage
entries: You are proficient in the {@skill Stealth} skill and your proficiency bonus is doubled for this skill.

entries.name: Mistwalk
entries: After reaching 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell blur} spell without any material components. Once you have cast this spell using this feature, you can't cast it again with this feature until you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

entries.name: See Truth
entries: You are proficient in the {@skill Insight} skill and your proficiency bonus is doubled for this skill.

entries.name: Divine Truth
entries: After reaching 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell augury} spell without any material components. Once you have cast this spell using this feature, you can't cast it again with this feature until you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

entries.name: First Punch
entries: You have advantage on Initiative rolls.

entries.name: Burning Clarity
entries: After reaching 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell branding smite} spell without any material components. Once you have cast this spell using this feature, you can't cast it again with this feature until you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

entries.name: Ability Score Increase
entries: Your Strength score increases by 2, and one other ability score of your choice increases by 1.

entries.name: Go with your Gut
entries: You have proficiency in either the {@skill Deception} or {@skill Insight} skill. You choose the skill when you select this lineage.

entries.name: Corsair Duel
entries: If you are within 5 feet of a creature that is your size or smaller and no other creatures are within 5 feet of you, that creature may not willingly move outside of your melee range unless you permit them to.

entries.name: Ability Score Increase
entries: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and one other ability score of your choice increases by 1.

entries.name: Quick Eye
entries: You have proficiency in either the {@skill Investigation} or {@skill Perception} skill. You choose the skill when you select this lineage.

entries.name: Flitcheye
entries: As an action, you may dig a small burrow in non-magical earth or loose stone large enough for a medium creature. You may hide in this burrow as a bonus action. You can create this burrow a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus and regain all uses after competing a long rest.

entries.name: Lay in Wait
entries: You have advantage on stealth checks made to hide underground or in holes.

entries.name: Ability Score Increase
entries: Your Wisdom score increases by 2, and one other ability score of your choice increases by 1.

entries.name: Nimble
entries: You have proficiency in either the {@skill Acrobatics} or {@skill Athletics} skill.
You choose the skill when you select this lineage.

entries.name: Guerilla Tactics
entries: As a bonus action, you can move up to your speed. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks and the next stealth check you make within the next minute is made at advantage. You can use this feature twice per day and regain all uses after completing a long rest. If you are in a grassland, you can use this feature two additional times.

system.description.value:
As an action, you can curl into a ball and roll through the battlefield. If you roll within 5 feet of another creature, you may choose to make it succeed on a DC15 Dexterity saving throw or be damaged by your spikes. On a failure, they take piercing damage given by a number of d4 equal to your proficiency bonus.

Your AC becomes 20 for the duration of this movement.

This feature may affect a number of creatures up to your proficiency bonus and uses your action and your movement.

When you are hit with a melee attack, you can choose to use your reaction to deal 1d4 piercing damage to the attacking creature.

This damage increases to 2d4 at 5th level, 3d4 at 11th level, and 4d4 at 17th level.
system.description.chat: You strike back with your spikes as a reaction.
system.activation.condition: when you are hit by a melee attack

system.description.value: As a bonus action, you may kick a creature within 5 feet of you. This counts as a melee weapon attack and uses your Dexterity modifier and proficiency bonus. On a hit, the creature takes 1d6 bludgeoning damage plus your Dexterity modifier, and must make a DC 13 strength saving throw or be pushed 5 feet away. If the creature fails by 5 or more, it is pushed 10 feet away. You may use this trait a number of times equal to your Proficiency bonus. You regain all uses after completing a long rest.

As an action, you can make a melee weapon attack using your tail. You may add your strength modifier and your proficiency bonus to the attack roll. It has a reach of 5ft, with one target. On a hit, you do 1d8 plus your strength modifier bludgeoning damage. This attack is not made at disadvantage due to being underwater.
